name: Leaflet Maps Marker Image Extension
author: Neil Boyd

sections.description:
Extension to Leaflet Maps Marker to make markers from images.

An option is added to the image menu to create a marker from the image.
The location info in the image is used to define the location of the marker.

Tested with:

  • WordPress: 3.7 to 4.1.1
  • Leaflet Maps Marker: 3.9.5 to 3.9.6
  • Maps Marker Pro: 1.9.1 to 2.0
  • NextGEN Gallery: 2.0.66 to 2.0.77

Please contact me with suggestions for other gallery plugins that I could support.
sections.installation: Login to your WordPress dashboard, go to Plugins >> Add New, search for image-marker, and click to install.
sections.faq:
Why do images in NextGEN gallery not have location info?

When you upload the image, do not resize it since that removes the location info.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Use full size image when there’s no smaller thumbnail

1.0.0

  • Initial version
  • Support for WordPress media library and NextGEN Gallery
